description: Multi-tenant analytics and business intelligence platform with real-time dashboards and data processing

characteristics.name: Availability
characteristics.reason: Customers rely on analytics for business decisions - downtime impacts trust

characteristics.name: Performance
characteristics.target: Dashboard load < 2 seconds, query execution < 5 seconds (95th percentile)
characteristics.reason: Slow dashboards lead to customer churn - performance is key differentiator

characteristics.name: Scalability
characteristics.targetDescription: Elastic scaling for growing customer base and data volumes
characteristics.reason: SaaS model requires efficient multi-tenant scaling

characteristics.name: Security
characteristics.target: SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, tenant data isolation
characteristics.targetDescription: Complete data isolation, encryption, access controls
characteristics.reason: Customers trust us with sensitive business data

characteristics.name: Reliability
characteristics.targetDescription: Accurate analytics data, reliable query execution
characteristics.reason: Business decisions based on our data must be accurate

characteristics.name: Fault Tolerance
characteristics.targetDescription: Continue operating with reduced functionality during failures
characteristics.reason: Partial service better than complete outage

characteristics.name: Recoverability
characteristics.reason: Customer data loss unacceptable for business SaaS

characteristics.name: Maintainability
characteristics.targetDescription: Clean, well-documented code for rapid feature development
characteristics.reason: Fast feature velocity requires maintainable codebase

characteristics.name: Deployability
characteristics.target: Deploy 10+ times per day, canary releases, instant rollback
characteristics.targetDescription: Continuous deployment with zero customer impact
characteristics.reason: SaaS requires rapid feature delivery and bug fixes

characteristics.name: Configurability
characteristics.targetDescription: Each customer can customize dashboards, branding, features
characteristics.reason: SaaS customers expect customization without custom code

characteristics.name: Extensibility
characteristics.target: Plugin marketplace, custom integrations, webhook support
characteristics.targetDescription: Customers can extend platform with custom connectors and plugins
characteristics.reason: Analytics platform must integrate with diverse data sources

characteristics.name: Interoperability
characteristics.target: RESTful API, webhooks, 100+ data source connectors
characteristics.targetDescription: Integrate with popular SaaS tools (Salesforce, Stripe, Shopify, etc.)
characteristics.reason: SaaS analytics requires data from multiple sources

characteristics.name: Usability
characteristics.target: Time to first value < 10 minutes, NPS > 50
characteristics.targetDescription: Intuitive self-service analytics, minimal onboarding time
characteristics.reason: SaaS adoption depends on ease of use

businessContext.pricingModel: Subscription-based (tiers based on data volume and users)

technicalConstraints.team: 25 engineers (5 teams: Frontend, Backend, Data Engineering, ML, DevOps)

keyScenarios.description: New customer creates first dashboard in < 10 minutes
Query 1TB dataset and return results in < 10 seconds
Onboard 100 new customers without impacting existing customers
Customer builds custom data connector in < 2 hours
Deploy new feature to 10% of customers (canary), gradually increase
Handle data source outage without affecting other tenants

multiTenancy.isolationModel: Database per tenant (metadata) + shared Clickhouse with tenant filtering
multiTenancy.resourceAllocation: CPU/memory limits per tenant to prevent noisy neighbors
multiTenancy.billing: Usage-based metering for compute and storage

customization.whiteLabeling: Custom domain, logo, colors per tenant

customerSuccess.documentation: Interactive tutorials, API docs, video guides

competitiveDifferentiators.performance: Sub-second query response on billion-row datasets
competitiveDifferentiators.easOfUse: No SQL required - visual query builder
